channel.title: Apollo - Revision 2
channel.description:
[center]Well this is from when OS relaunched its what ever the second update was. Apollo Based
Server: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ev6qbk8kg93m18x/_3pINvayny [b] [u]Features[/u][/b][code] Update Server Complete WindowPane & Mapregion Encoders added Login Completed started player updating renamed a few client classes Switched to the actual osrs client update server windowpane player updating player masks
A lot of packets complete dialogues compete equipment item interactions (clean, wear, use) a lot of skill related packets complete NPC Updating Dialogue packets npc option packets full banking herblore skill started[/code]
Source: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ev6qbk8kg93m18x/_3pINvayny Client: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/7ba79mglk17n8o9/dEbgcxMkh9
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/67DbOfP.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4RTpM.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TZYXXCI.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4SyWU.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NKzfLK4.png[/img]
[/center]
[/center]

Hump de Bump

I am looking for a clean source with minimal stuff added to it and stumbled upon this. Sadly, the files in the download links are no longer available. If anyone has a copy of this source or a suggestion for an alternative, please help a fellow Moparian out
[/quote]
u could use asteria, niboe, hyperion, etc.[/quote]
Will look into those, thank you

Read full topic
